message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. It's a significant investment, but I'm confident it will pay off in the long run. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $1500000 is a bit out of my range. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go as high as $1200000. This is my final offer. Let me know your thoughts.

Bob, I understand your position, and I appreciate your interest in the product. While $1200000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $1300000 to make this deal happen. This is my final offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
